attributes.action: create a legal minium distance between parked cars.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is within reason that parking laws are extended so that cars parked end to end, ie along a street and bumper to bumper, have to park with a miniumum distance between them to prevent cars from becoming blocked into their parking space.  I propose that cars must park with a minimum of 50cm between each bumper.
